title: Bulb brightness long time after switch closed

content.description:
Refer to the following material to answer the group of questions.

The circuit shown above contains four identical lightbulbs with constant resistance, a capacitor C, which is initially uncharged, and a switch S. The switch is initially open.
content.question: After the switch has been closed a long time, how does the brightness of bulb 4 compare with its brightness before the switch was closed?

choices.label: Bulb 4 is much dimmer and is only barely lit.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
